content.value:
I've dated over 100 tech guys aged 18-36 in last 25 years.

When I look back at all of them, I wish I had spent 100% of that time adopting a child. 

I'd have actually raised a kid, not just a man disguised as one.

Tech guys are a distraction until you achieve self-love.
